name: Living Quarters
description: There are people sleeping here, and you can hear snoring

items.name: Uniform
items.description: A uniform given to members of the galley staff

actionResponse.look: A uniform given to members of the galley staff
actionResponse.get: You put the uniform in your inventory.
actionResponse.equip: You put on the uniform. Very fancy!
actionResponse.drop: You drop the uniform on the ground.

name: Inventory
description: You open your inventory and look inside. You have:

name: South Sky Bridge
description:
As you walk into the Sky Bridge, the airlock shuts behind you. 
You see spacesuits prepared for use

items.name: Spacesuit
items.description: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.

actionResponse.look: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.
actionResponse.get: You put the spacesuit in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You leave the spacesuit on the ground.

name: Sector 1
description:
There are people passing by, with the gym to the west, pressurized gardens to the east, 
sector 2 to the north, and south sky bridge to the south.

name: Pressurized Gardens
description:
The space is filled with edible and medicinal plants. 
You see a gardener watering some vegetables.

characters.name: Gardener
characters.description: They seem friendly, but they have a lot of dirt on their hands.

actionResponse.look: They seem friendly, but they have a lot of dirt on their hands.
actionResponse.talk: You talk to the Gardener

items.name: Milk
items.description: This Milk must be plant-based.

actionResponse.look: This Milk must be plant-based.
actionResponse.get: You put the Milk in your inventory for later. Hope it doesn't spill...
actionResponse.drop: You drop the Milk on the ground. It splatters a little.

dialog: %s: Check this out! Plants are amazing, aren’t they?
%s: What a lovely day for gardening!

name: Gym
description:
A fitness fanatic is doing pull-ups nearby. 
The weight racks look secure, but you never feel certain…

characters.name: Fitness Fanatic

actionResponse.look: They're really buff!
actionResponse.talk: You greet the Fitness Fanatic

items.name: Butter
items.description: This is a good source of calories.

actionResponse.look: This is a good source of calories.
actionResponse.get: You put the Butter in your inventory for later. What if it melts?
actionResponse.drop: You drop the Butter on the ground. It's now out of your inventory.

dialog: %s: I always sneak into the kitchen for extra gains. Shh, don’t tell anyone!
%s: Whoa, that butter gave you killer biceps!!

name: Sector 2
description:
There are people passing by, with the Living quarters to the west, 
bathrooms to the east, sector 1 to the south, and mess hall to the north.

name: Bathrooms
description: Looks like a normal bathroom.

name: Mess Hall
description:
There are people eating, with the kitchen to the east, 
sector 3 to the north, sector 2 to the south, and nothing to the west.

characters.name: Cadet
characters.description: They seem young to be wearing a military uniform.

actionResponse.look: They seem young to be wearing a military uniform.
actionResponse.talk: You talk to the Cadet

items.name: Tortillas
items.description: These look nice and fresh.

actionResponse.look: These look nice and fresh.
actionResponse.get: You put the Tortillas in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the Tortillas on the ground.

dialog: %s: Want these? I got an extra bag at the commissary.
%s: You can never have too many Tortillas.

name: Kitchen
description:
The Head Chef is calling out orders to other Kitchen staff, 
and has a recipe for you to gather ingredients and cook for Mess Hall diners tonight. 
The Mess Hall is to the west, and nothing else surrounds the Kitchen.

items.name: Snacks
items.description: These look tasty.

actionResponse.look: These look tasty.
actionResponse.get: You put the snacks in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the snacks on the ground.

characters.name: Head Chef
characters.description: The Head Chef is wearing a white chef uniform and a big floppy hat.

actionResponse.look: The Head Chef is wearing a white chef uniform and a big floppy hat.
actionResponse.talk: You talk to the Head Chef

items.name: Space Spaghetti Recipe
items.description:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Noodles, Martian Meatballs, Tomato Sauce

actionResponse.look:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Noodles, Martian Meatballs, Tomato Sauce
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Lunar Lamb Recipe
items.description:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Butter, Pepper, Lunar Lamb Chops

actionResponse.look:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Butter, Pepper, Lunar Lamb Chops
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Cosmic Curry Recipe
items.description:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Rice, Tofu, Cosmic Curry Powder

actionResponse.look:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Rice, Tofu, Cosmic Curry Powder
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Terrestrial Fish Tacos Recipe
items.description:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Tortillas, Terrestrial Space Fish, Salsa

actionResponse.look:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Tortillas, Terrestrial Space Fish, Salsa
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

items.name: Planetary Pancakes Recipe
items.description:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Flying Saucer Flour, Milk, Baking Powder

actionResponse.look:
You better gather these ingredients for the Chef! 
You need: Flying Saucer Flour, Milk, Baking Powder
actionResponse.get: You put the recipe into your inventory

dialog: %s: Hello, Sous Chef!

name: Sector 3
description:
There are people walking by, you see something that looks like a door on the floor 
which you’d like to check out sometime, with the Information Center to the west, 
the Medical Bay to the East, Mess Hall to the south, and sector 4 to the north.

name: Bilge
description:
It’s an interesting space, lots of under the table trading going on, 
maybe you could find something interesting here? 
You can exit (up) to go back to Sector 3.

characters.name: Shadowy Figure
characters.description: The shadows prevent you from getting a clear look at their face.

actionResponse.look: The shadows prevent you from getting a clear look at their face.
actionResponse.talk: You hesitantly talk to the Shadowy Figure

items.name: Noodles
items.description: Can’t make spaghetti without the noodles!

actionResponse.look: Can’t make spaghetti without the noodles!
actionResponse.get: You put the noodles in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the noodles on the ground.

dialog: %s: Get me some Snacks and I'll give you a reward.
%s: Mmm... stolen Snacks always taste the best.

name: Information Center
description:
The Information Center is the place to get information on almost anything you’d be curious about. 
The information center liaison is just the person to talk to in order to check out a GPS for use on the discovery pod. 
With Sector 3 to the east, nothing else surrounds the Information Center.

characters.name: Information Center Liaison
characters.description: They look like they might have some useful information.

actionResponse.look: They look like they might have some useful information.
actionResponse.talk: You politely greet the Information Center Liason

items.name: GPS
items.description: A device that can be used to track your location and navigate.

actionResponse.look: A device that can be used to track your location and navigate.
actionResponse.get: You put the GPS in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the GPS on the ground.

dialog:
%s: Do you need a GPS? They can be used to navigate to the Volcano Planet, 
the Rainforest Planet, the Snow Planet, the Swamp Planet and the Desert Planet.
%s: Traveling to distant planets can be dangerous. Be careful!

name: Medical Bay
description:
There don’t seem to be any patients today. You see a lab tech sweeping the deck. 
Maybe they know where some ingredients are

characters.name: Lab Technician

actionResponse.look: They seem bored.
actionResponse.talk: You greet the Lab Technician

items.name: Tofu
items.description: This will be good with some curry powder.

actionResponse.look: This will be good with some curry powder.
actionResponse.get: You put the tofu in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the Tofu on the ground.

dialog: %s: Did you know the ship’s tofu is lab-grown
%s: Tofu is delicious, no matter where it came from.

name: Sector 4
description: There are lots of important people walking by. Better get through here quickly.

name: Command Center
description: This door is locked.

name: Engineering Spaces
description: This door is locked

name: North Sky Bridge
description:
As you walk into the Sky Bridge, the airlock shuts behind you. 
You see spacesuits prepared for use and a Pod Technician taking logs. 
The Pod Technician might know which planet the ingredient you seek could be on, why don’t we ask him?

items.name: Spacesuit
items.description: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.

actionResponse.look: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.
actionResponse.get: You put the spacesuit in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the spacesuit on the ground.

characters.name: Pod Technician

actionResponse.look: Their tool belt looks heavy.
actionResponse.talk: You greet the Pod Technician

items.name: Key
items.description: This doesn't appear to be a door key.

actionResponse.look: This doesn't appear to be a door key.
actionResponse.get: You pick up the key, which feels surprisingly heavy in your hand.
actionResponse.drop: Your key was dropped. How will you fly the Discovery Pod?

dialog: %s: You sure you know how to fly this thing? Make sure you use gps.
%s: Safe travels!

name: Discovery Pod
description:
The doorway to discovery! 
The discovery pod is your ticket to exploring the many planets this section of the Milky Way has to offer. 
You’re able to use the GPS to navigate to one of the 5 planets (relatively to the ship)

items.name: Pepper
items.description: Wonder how old this is…

actionResponse.look: Wonder how old this is…
actionResponse.get: You put the pepper shaker in your inventory for later
actionResponse.drop: You drop the pepper on the ground. How can you cook lamb or beef without pepper?

name: North Volcano Planet
description: This quadrant is home a shiny space rock, maybe it can be traded for something else of value?

items.name: Space Rock
items.description: shiny space rock

actionResponse.look: shiny space rock
actionResponse.get: You put the rock in your inventory. It's heavier than it looks!
actionResponse.drop: You drop the heavy Space Rock on the ground. A small earthquake occurs.

name: South Volcano Planet
description:
This quadrant is just a fiery landscape. 
There seems to be a random alien here as well.

characters.name: Random Alien
characters.description: They don't seem very interested in you.

actionResponse.look: They don't seem very interested in you.
actionResponse.talk: You greet the Random Alien in a common alien language.

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker, have you ever tried the local hot springs? They're great for relaxing after a long day of running away from lava.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I'm not saying I'm an expert on volcanoes, but I do have a PhD in lava dodging.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, if you want to impress the locals, try eating a volcano pepper. Just don't come crying to me when your insides start to melt.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I'm convinced that the only reason the volcanoes on this planet erupt so often is because they're angry at us for being so delicious.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once tried to ride a lava flow like a surfboard. It did not end well.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, do you know what they call a group of aliens who live near a volcano? Toast.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I've always said that the key to survival on this planet is to have a good pair of running shoes and a healthy fear of molten rock.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, some aliens come to this planet for the thrill of dodging lava. I'm just here for the marshmallows.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I heard a rumor that the volcanoes on this planet are actually giant alien barbecue grills. Just don't tell the humans.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, if you ever need a place to stay, I've got a spare lava-proof igloo. It's not much, but it's home.

name: West Volcano Planet
description:
This quadrant is just...hot. 
Nothing of interest here. Maybe the other quadrants will be interesting.

name: East Volcano Planet
description:
A mysterious Lava Monster is lurking in this quadrant. 
Maybe they'll have something we could use?

monster.name: Lava Monster
monster.description: They probably don't ever get cold. You see Martian Meatballs sizzling in the lava.

actionResponse.look: They probably don't ever get cold.
actionResponse.talk: You fearfully greet the Lava Monster

items.name: Martian Meatballs
items.description: You're too afraid to ask what these are made of.

actionResponse.look: You're too afraid to ask what these are made of.
actionResponse.get: You put the meatballs in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: The Meatballs drop from your pocket.

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker

name: North Rainforest Planet
description:
A Vine Monster rules this quadrant. 
Should you take your chances and talk to them?

monster.name: Vine Monster
monster.description: How many vines does it have? Too many to count.

actionResponse.look: How many vines does it have? Too many to count.
actionResponse.talk: You fearfully greet the Vine Monster

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker

name: West Rainforest Planet
description: A Random Creature roams this quadrant. It continues to rain heavily.

characters.name: Random Creature

actionResponse.look: They don't look very friendly...
actionResponse.talk: You fearfully greet the Random Creature

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker, I don't always climb trees, but when I do, I fall out of them
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, Have you ever tried the local fruit? It's delicious! Except for the ones that are secretly trying to kill you.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I'm not saying I'm the king of the jungle, but I do have a really cool crown made of leaves and twigs.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once tried to have a staring contest with a sloth. I lost, but it was worth it.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, if you're ever lost in the rainforest, just follow the sound of my terrible singing. I promise, it won't lead you anywhere useful.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, do you know why I'm always covered in mud? It's because I'm a master of disguise. Shh, don't tell anyone.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I heard that some Earthlings have a pet called a 'cat.' What's that? Is it delicious?
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I'm not sure what's scarier - the giant snakes, or the tiny frogs that can kill you with a single touch.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, if you need me, I'll be in my treehouse, playing video games and eating bugs. The good life.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once challenged a chameleon to a game of hide-and-seek. It was a tie.

name: East Rainforest Planet
description:
This quadrant's main feature is a Giant Snail Shell. 
Can we even fit that on the Discovery Pod?!

items.name: Giant Snail Shell
items.description: There’s no one living here anymore!

actionResponse.look: There’s no one living here anymore!
actionResponse.get: You put the giant snail shell in your inventory. Ew, slimy!
actionResponse.drop: You regretfully place the Giant Snail Shell on the ground.

name: North Snow Planet
description:
A super chilly place where ou always feel like you're doing the Ice Bucket Challenge. 
Nothing here except cold wind.

name: South Snow Planet
description:
Good place to go skating in case you feel bored. 
There’s nothing to see here except snow as far the eye can see. 
There are more quadrants to the North, West & East.

name: West Snow Planet
description:
Living here for a long time can help you become a great figure skater 
A sparkly object is on the ground nearby.

items.name: Snowflake Crystal
items.description: An oddity that won’t melt, but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!

actionResponse.look: An oddity that won’t melt, but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!
actionResponse.get:
As you pick up the crystal, you feel a surge of power flow through your body. 
You put the crystal in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the crystal on the ground.

name: East Snow Planet
description:
An Ice Monster roams this quadrant, and might have something interesting.
There are more quadrants to the North, South & West.

monster.name: Ice Monster
monster.description: They look like they could freeze you solid. You see Cosmic Curry Powder sticking out the monster's coat.

actionResponse.look: They look like they could freeze you solid.
actionResponse.talk: You fearfully greet the Ice Monster

items.name: Cosmic Curry Powder
items.description: Curry is perfect for cold weather.

actionResponse.look: Curry is perfect for cold weather.
actionResponse.get: You put the Curry Powder in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: Are you crazy? You drop the delicious cosmic curry powder.

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker

name: North Swamp Planet
description: Nothing here except a space walker. There are other quadrants to the South, West & East

characters.name: Spacewalker Felix
characters.description: You don't see a pod anywhere, how did they get here?

actionResponse.look: You don't see a pod anywhere, how did they get here?
actionResponse.talk: You greet Spacewalker Felix

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker, did you know that the mud here is so thick, even the mosquitoes have trouble flying through it?
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I'm not afraid of the alligators here. It's the mosquitoes I'm worried about. They're the real predators.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once saw a plant here that was so big, it tried to eat me. Luckily, I was too tough to digest.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, if you need me, I'll be in my swamp hut, cooking up some 'gator gumbo. Want to try some?
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I have a pet mosquito named Buzz. He's a real pain in the neck, but he's loyal.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once tried to make a raft out of vines and leaves. It didn't work, but I ended up with a really cool hat.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, the mosquitoes here are so big, they have landing strips for planes. No joke.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once saw a frog here that was so big, it ate an alligator. Or maybe it was the other way around. I forget.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, if you ever get lost in the swamp, just look for the giant neon sign that says 'Welcome to North Swamp Planet.' We spare no expense.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once wrestled an alligator here. It was a draw, but I think he let me win.

name: South Swamp Planet
description:
A Swamp Monster is guarding something. I wonder what they're guarding?  
The weather on this planet is humid, and the swamp is a mystery.

monster.name: Swamp Monster
monster.description: You see the monster's eyes peeking out from the swamp. You see a Terrestrial Space Fish flopping in the monster's hand.

actionResponse.look: You see the monster's eyes peeking out from the swamp water.
actionResponse.talk: You fearfully greet the Swamp Monster

items.name: Terrestrial Space Fish
items.description: This space fish lives on land.

actionResponse.look: This space fish lives on land.
actionResponse.get: You put the fish in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the fish on the ground. Luckily, it's a terrestrial fish!

name: West Swamp Planet
description: Nothing here except an interesting fossil of a frog. There are more quadrants to the North, South & East.

items.name: Frog Fossil
items.description: You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.

actionResponse.look: You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.
actionResponse.get: You put the fossil in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the frog fossil on the ground.

items.name: Lightning Glass
items.description: It shines in the light.

actionResponse.look: It shines in the light.
actionResponse.get: You carefully pick up the glass and put it in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You carefully place the Lightning Glass on the ground.

characters.name: Desert Alien
characters.description: They seem to be handling the heat just fine.

actionResponse.look: They seem to be handling the heat just fine.
actionResponse.talk: You greet the Desert Alien in the Desert Planet language.

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker, I don't always drink water, but when I do, I prefer it with a side of sand.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I tried to make a sandcastle once, but it just turned into a pile of sand. Oops!
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I love a good sandstorm. It's like a giant, sandy hug.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, Do you have any idea how hard it is to find a good cactus to hug around here?
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I once met a space cowboy who tried to lasso a sand dune. He wasn't very good.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, Why did the desert alien cross the road? To get to the sand dune on the other side!
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, My favorite pastime is playing hide-and-seek with the tumbleweeds.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, Have you tried our local delicacy, the sand sandwich? It's just sand between two slices of sand.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I heard that Earthlings have something called 'ice cream.' Sounds terrifying.
%s: Hello, Spacewalker, I used to be a sand castle architect, but I got sandbagged by the competition.

monster.name: Sand Monster
monster.description: It's hard to tell where the sand starts and the sand monster ends. You see Baking Powder hidden in the dunes.

actionResponse.look: It's hard to tell where the sand starts and the sand monster ends.

items.name: Baking Powder
items.description: Does this mean baking powder is made of sand?

actionResponse.look: Does this mean baking powder is made of sand?
actionResponse.get: You carefully scoop up some of the powder into a small container, being careful not to spill any. You put it in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the baking powder on the ground. A cloud of baking powder rises up into the air.

dialog: %s: Hello, Spacewalker

name: Floating Garden
description: The floating gardens is the place to meet crewmates from other ships in the fleet! The ships have visited many different parts of the galaxy/universe and some folks might be willing to trade some tasty ingredients for some interesting planet artifacts!

items.name: Flying Saucer Flour
items.description: A small satchel of flour that makes your hands powdery.

actionResponse.look: A small satchel of flour that makes your hands powdery.
actionResponse.get: You put the flour in your inventory for later.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the flour on the ground.

characters.name: Spacewalker Sam
characters.description: Their spacesuit is definitely too long for them.

actionResponse.look: Their spacesuit is definitely too long for them.
actionResponse.talk: You greet Spacewalker Sam

items.name: Tomato Sauce
items.description: A rich and flavorful tomato sauce, perfect for pasta or as a base for other dishes.

actionResponse.look: A rich and flavorful tomato sauce, perfect for pasta or as a base for other dishes.
actionResponse.get: You put the tomato sauce in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the tomato sauce on the ground. Splat!

dialog: %s: Do you have any interesting fossils? I make the best spaghetti sauce, but I don’t give it to strangers for free.
%s: If anyone asks, I'm not out here.

characters.name: Spacewalker Nyckolle

actionResponse.look: They love talking about recipes!
actionResponse.talk: You greet Spacewalker Nyckolle

items.name: Salsa
items.description: It has some spice to it, but would go great with seafood!

actionResponse.look: It has some spice to it, but would go great with seafood!
actionResponse.get: You put the salsa in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the salsa on the ground.

dialog: %s: Salsa is my jam! I’ll trade you some for something sparkly from the snow planet!
%s: Have you looked at all the plants?

characters.name: Spacewalker Kun
characters.description: They might be interested in trading.

actionResponse.look: They might be interested in trading.
actionResponse.talk: You greet Spacewalker Kun

items.name: Lunar Lamb Chops
items.description: Several lamb chops, ready to be cooked.

actionResponse.look: Several lamb chops, ready to be cooked.
actionResponse.get: You put the lamb chops in your inventory.
actionResponse.drop: You drop  the lamb chops.

dialog: %s: Have you been to the Volcano planet? I hear they have beautiful rocks there.
%s: Did you end up cooking something nice?

characters.name: Spacewalker Jasper
characters.description: They're always hanging out in the floating garden.

actionResponse.look: They're always hanging out in the floating garden.
actionResponse.talk: You greet Spacewalker Jasper

items.name: Rice
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice that pairs well with many dishes.

actionResponse.look: A fragrant and flavorful rice that pairs well with many dishes.
actionResponse.get: You scoop up a handful of rice, admiring the way it shimmers in the light. You put the rice in your inventory.
actionResponse.use: You cook the rice to perfection, enjoying the aroma and the delicate flavor.
actionResponse.drop: You drop the rice on the ground.

dialog: %s: Do you have any lightning glass? I have rice to trade.
%s: There's nothing like a spacewalk in the morning.
